features.title: Why choose
features.subtitle: Designed to make your life easier with intelligent WhatsApp reminders, one message at a time.

whatsappReminder.title: Unlimited automatic reminders
whatsappReminder.description: One-off or recurring. Weekly, monthly, with excuses or without mercy. Whatever, whenever ‚Äî as many times as needed.

recurring.title: Recurring events

superpowers.title: Superpowers for people who can't keep up with everything

reminders.title: Unlimited automatic reminders
reminders.description: One-time or recurring. Weekly, monthly, with excuses or relentless. For anything, anytime, as many times as needed.

messages.sender: Memorae, remind me tomorrow at 8 a.m. that I have to take my medication
messages.receiver: I've created your reminder for tomorrow at 8 a.m. so you don't forget your medication. Don't forget to dedicate that moment to taking care of yourself!üßò

calendars.title: All your calendars in one chat
calendars.description: Google, Outlook. Your appointments, events and tasks connected. So nothing escapes you. Even if you try.

messages.sender: Memorae, cancel any events scheduled from Thursday at 6:00 PM in all my calendars.
messages.receiver: I've canceled all events scheduled after Thursday at 6:00 PM in all your calendars.

focus.title: Lists that don't get lost
focus.description: Tasks, errands, ideas or whatever. You can dictate them, write them or just drop them. No matter how you do it, your list gets saved.

messages.sender: Memorae, add Stranger Things to my list of series I want to watch!
messages.receiver: I've added "Stranger Things" to your list of series you want to watch.

insights.title: Voice notes that become tasks
insights.description: Your voice is enough. Memorae listens, transcribes and organizes what you say. That easy.

messages.receiver: You've sent 1,245 messages this month. Keep it up! üìà

listas.title: From photo to reminder
listas.description: Take a photo of what you want to remember. A whiteboard, a post-it, a scribbled sheet. If you understand it, Memorae does too.

messages.sender: What other ideas do you give me?
messages.receiver: I've created a note titled 'Blog Ideas' and added 'Write about productivity and time management' to the note.

integracion.title: Smart searches, without leaving WhatsApp
integracion.description: Questions? Data? Ideas? Ask it on WhatsApp. Get thoughtful answers, thanks to integrated ChatGPT and DeepSeek.

messages.sender: I'm going to Lisbon this weekend, what's the weather going to be like?
messages.receiver: For the weekend of August 9-10, 2025 in Lisbon, mostly sunny and warm weather is expected.‚òÄÔ∏è

testimonials.text: I use it every day, though sometimes I forget I asked it to remind me and when it alerts me it saves my life. Supernova plan is the best, plus I save on ChatGPT
If Memorae didn't remind me of the thousand things I have to do every day, my kids would go to school without backpacks, without food, and probably without me.
I work odd shifts, zero desire to open the calendar. I talk to Memorae and my life stays in order. Sometimes I explain too much and it gets confused but oh well, just like me.

I didn't think I'd use it so much, but now I have it for everything. 'Remind me to buy diapers on Thursday', 'add milk to the list', 'delete the dentist appointment'. It's awesome that it's a WhatsApp contact
I use it for meeting reminders and quick notes without having to open apps. I didn't know I needed this until I tried it
I use it to remember university stuff and also for silly things like 'remind me to watch that series they recommended'. What I use most... Google Calendar integration (amazing)
My wife and I use it for everything. If it ever disappears, we disappear with it. No joke.
If it weren't for Memorae, I would have forgotten half of my meetings this month. My boss thinks I'm organized. Literally feel like a fraud, but an efficient one.
I always forget everything. Now I only forget to ask Memorae to remind me of more things. But hey, Memorae, besides loving you, you're very cute.

pills.topText: If your hand doesn't tremble when paying ‚Ç¨5 for an 'artisanal' coffee
pills.bottomText: why not invest in remembering everything?
